description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler with callback methods related to container lifecycle events, intended for handling container state change notifications within the WPEFramework plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class defining callback methods for container event notifications such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container starts, with container data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container stops, with container data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container fails, with container data provided as a JsonObject reference.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Callback invoked when a container's state changes, with container data provided as a JsonObject reference.
